data.name: Drifters Loot the Galaxy - Founder's Pack
data.detailed_description:
Show your support for Drifters Loot the Galaxy and receive an exceptional value with the official Founders Pack! This amazing content bundle comes jam packed with exclusive content at over 70% off of the standard retail price, making it the ultimate way to start your drifting career in style.

Features:
  • 5 Exclusive Epic “Exiles” Skins
  • 5 Exclusive Rare “United” Skins
  • 5 Exclusive Epic Emojis
  • 5 Exclusive Rare “Wanted Poster” Sprays
  • Digital Artbook
  • Official Game Soundtrack
  • 2000 Zenith (Enough to buy two Legendary Skins!)

The Founder’s Pack is a limited time offer so don’t miss out! Any intergalactic raider worth one's loot knows this is a literal steal!

Blind Squirrel Games thanks you for your support! We wouldn’t be able to develop Drifters Loot the Galaxy without the support of our fans, and we can’t wait to see you drift into battle!

data.short_description: Show your support for Drifters Loot the Galaxy and receive an exceptional value with the official Founders Pack! This amazing content bundle comes jam packed with exclusive content at over 70% off of the standard retail price, making it the ultimate way to start your drifting career in style.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
